officers.title: President
officers.name: Caleb Luzovich
officers.bio: Hi there! I am a sophomore student pursuing a major in Computer Science. Security is a huge passion of mine, and I am especially fascinated by the tools and methods used to protect one's identity online. In my free time, I enjoy developing web applications and playing some video-games.
responsibilities: Lead meetings and delegate tasks to officers

officers.title: Secretary
officers.name: Everett Lewark
officers.bio: I'm a senior majoring in Computer Science who does full-stack development and research in the field of distributed systems. In my free time, I enjoy making video games and electronic music. The dramatic impacts of malware are what initially sparked my interest in cybersecurity many years ago.

officers.title: Treasurer
officers.name: Eli Povolny
officers.bio: I'm a sophomore majoring in Computer Science. I'm most interested in offensive security and security research. I also rock climb, so ask me about going up walls.
